definition: Ministry of Foreign Affairs/foreign office/Dept. of State
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: The Premier deputed the Foreign Minister to act as his deputy.
sentences.chinese: 總理委派外交部長作爲他的代表。

sentences.english: China's Foreign Ministry expressed concern on Tuesday about the South Korean-U. S. drills.
sentences.chinese: 中國外交部對於週二的韓美聯合軍演表達了關注。

sentences.english: He will deputize for the foreign minister.
The Foreign Ministry supports the sale, since it believes it will improve Israeli-Russian relations.
sentences.chinese: 外交部同意該軍售，因爲這會改善俄以關係。

sentences.english: The South Korean Foreign Minister Kim Sung-hwan also said that he suspected that there were additional nuclear facilities in North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 韓國外交部長金星煥也懷疑朝鮮還有另外的核設施。

sentences.english: Foreign Minister Li Zhaoxing and other officials were present at the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 外交部長李肇星等會見時在座。

sentences.english: The foreign ministry refers not to the women, but to “the issue known as ‘wartime comfort women’”.
sentences.chinese: 日本外交部從不提及個別女性，只稱“戰時慰安婦”。

sentences.english: The Norwegian Foreign Ministry summoned Iran's envoy (charge d'affaires) in Oslo to protest the action.
sentences.chinese: 挪威外交部召見伊朗駐奧斯陸外交官提出抗議。

sentences.english: On March 25, Foreign Ministry Spokesman Kong Quan held the regular press conference.
sentences.chinese: 3月25日，外交部發言人孔泉主持例行記者招待會。

sentences.english: Libya's foreign ministry declared victory. Its glee was understandable.
sentences.chinese: 利比亞外交部宣佈勝利，喜悅之情是可以理解的。

sentences.english: Chinese Assistant Foreign Minister Wu Hailong attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 中國外交部部長助理吳海龍出席。

sentences.english: Princess Anne visited China on September 20 at the invitation of the Foreign Ministry of China.
sentences.chinese: 安妮公主是應外交部邀請於20日來華訪問的。

sentences.english: On Tuesday, a Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs official spoke to reporters about the U.
sentences.chinese: 一名中國外交部官員在週二就美國的行爲答記者問。

sentences.english: Welcome to the press conference. I have several announcements to start with.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎出席外交部例行記者會，首先我發佈幾條消息。

sentences.english: They met while she was on secondment from the Foreign Office.
sentences.chinese: 兩人是在她從外交部調來短期任職時認識的。

sentences.english: Britain's Foreign Office defended the decision to send Gass to the ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 英國外交部爲派遣Gass出席典禮進行辯解。

definition: foreign ministry (e.g. of Japan or Korea)
Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Qing Dynasty
minister/diplomat performing ambassadorial role in Qing times, before regular diplomatic relations
